frameDefinitions: This frame covers entities which are prototypically conceived of and created to fulfill the function of containing--i.e.
Words in the frame refer to any Document that has a legal status or conventional social significance.
A Record that contains a permanent account of Data.
A Text is an entity that contains linguistic, symbolic information on a Topic, created by an Author at the Time_of_creation.
A Gambler commits an Asset to a prediction that an Uncertain_situation will have a particular Outcome (or class of outcomes).

A Billing_authority communicates in written form that the Debtor owes the Owed_party (often the same as the Billing_authority) some amount of Money for certain Goods (including services) provided by the Owed_party or to clear a debt for a Bad_action by the Debtor against the Owed_party.
frameExamples: They got their marriage <t>licence</t> from Canada.
The bank's <t><fex name='Record'>books</fex></t> were not accurate.
listRoleDefinitions: <fen>Container</fen> is an object which is conventionally used as a container.  Target words in this frame are tagged with this frame element.
The holder of the document.
The authority that issues the document.
Obligation is the obligation that is imposed on the <fen>Bearer</fen> of the <fen>Document</fen>.
Right is the right of the <fen>Bearer</fen> of the <fen>Document</fen>  that is authorized by the <fen>Document</fen>.
Status is the state of the Bearer of the Document indicated by the Document.
Document is the piece of paper that has the legal status.
The <fex name='Record'>Record</fex> is the entity in which events or accounts are permanently recorded.
The region where the <fen>Record</fen> is sold, circulated, or otherwise popular
The <fen>Text</fen> is the entity that contains linguistic information. This an incorporated role for each LU in this frame.
The region where the <fen>Text</fen> is sold, circulated, or otherwise popular.
The person who wages the <fen>Asset</fen> on a certain Outcome.
Something desirable possessed by or directly associated with the <fen>Gambler</fen> which is lost if the <fen>Gambler</fen> loses the wager.
The <fen>Gambler</fen> predicts that a certain <fen>Outcome</fen> will hold.
The <fen>Gambler</fen> predicts how an <fen>Uncertain_situation</fen> will resolve.
The time when the <fen>Gambler</fen> makes the wager.
The place where the <fen>Gambler</fen> makes the wager.
The person (or organization) that owes the <fen>Owed_party</fen>.
The role <fen>Goods</fen> is anything (including labor or time, for example) which is exchanged for <fen>Money</fen> in a transaction.
<fen>Money</fen> is the thing given in exchange for <fen>Goods</fen> in a transaction, or as recompense for the <fen>Bad_action</fen>.
In some cases, price or payment is described per unit of <fen>Goods</fen>.

The <fen>Owed_party</fen> expects a specific amount of <fen>Money</fen> from the <fen>Debtor</fen>, either because the <fen>Debtor</fen> received <fen>Goods</fen> or because the <fen>Debtor</fen> performed a Bad_action against the Owed_party.
The individual who communicates to the <fen>Debtor</fen> the <fen>Money</fen> that they owe.

An earlier action by the <fen>Debtor</fen> causing harm (directly or indirectly) to the <fen>Owed_party</fen>, for which the <fen>Owed_party</fen> expects compensation, and therefore bills the <fen>Debtor</fen>.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>US consulate</fex> issued a Visa to Ms. Yang to travel to San Francisco.
They were all under subpoena <fex>to appear in court.</fex>
The couple just got their <fex>marriage</fex> certificate.
The police need a search <fex><t>warrant</t></fex> to enter his house.
She kept a <fex>record</fex> of how many times he asked to borrow money.
The pizza man billed <fex>Lee</fex> $35 for his order.
The man at the counter billed Lee <fex>for his dry-cleaning</fex>.
The clerk invoiced the little old lady <fex>$49.95</fex> for what she called 'a little hand-holding . '
The cleaner bills <fex>at forty dollars per hour</fex> for his services.
<fex>The salesman</fex> never billed me , so I did n't pay .

sourceCandidateSpans.text: NCR 7780 Image item Transport and NCR Scalable Image Item Processing System
little more than a year ago
